One morning Yun-Seong found himself reflecting looking at his blade. It seemed so long ago that Seong-Mina had told him of the White-Storm's power. (Anyone who's played the game knows) It had the power to let the holder reflect, see what they were looking for, see inside themselves. He stared deeply into the blade, not worrying about where he was walking. It was an open country anyway, with all kinds of landscapes. As he stared, he began to become entranced, until he actually passed out!

Yun-Seong awoke from his nap to find a massive blade near him. He finally realized his situation. "Holy hell! That's the White Storm!" He'd been shrunken to a small enough size to fit in the palm of a hand. Snapping from his confusion, he heard a rumbling in the earth. Someone was coming! But who?

11111.content: Yun-Seong saw the massive Greek woman coming towards him, and she wasn't looking his way. She walked with resolve, straight ahead, booming steps and a hardened gaze. She was a warrior, not a softy. Yun-Seong had a couple of options, but given the time frame, he'd have to act quickly. If he waved her down, she might crush him accidentally. If he did nothing, he'd surely die in the wilderness. If he made a jump for her sandal, he might die in the attempt. Trusting his luck and himself, however, Yun-Seong acted.

The size of Yun-Seong, they had been hunting to keep themselves alive. Stumbling across the boy, they brought him home to their village. Yun-Seong was laid out on a bed, and left alone to heal - with the aid of the village healer.

Weeks later, Yun-Seong awakes. "...Why aren't I dead?" He looked around, seeing a woman his size, wearing the robes of a monk. "Because we saved you, newcomer. Welcome to our village." Yun-Seong's eyes opened wide, "You mean I'm not small anymore!?" The woman shook her head sadly, "Oh no boy, we're all small here." Yun-Seong' hopes dropped. "You mean there's a village of tiny people? That's impossible." The woman nodded, "Seemingly so, but Soul Edge affects the people around the owner in strange ways." Yun-Seong didn't say anymore, that was the sword he sought. These people had apparently been shrunken, perhaps the entire village. If that was so, why didn't the owner of Soul Edge just crush the place? But that had been a long time ago, and only the whispers on the winds could tell.

142331.content:
One day, Cassandra was relaxing in under a tree having a peaceful picnic with her sister, Sophitia. They were simply chatting as they ate, mostly about their recent battles against the evil sword Soul Edge. Neither of them could have suspected what would happen next. As if out of nowhere, a colossal meteor shot down from the sky and crashed directly in front of the sisters. Cassandra, being the less responsible of the two, couldn't resist the urge to examine it. Sophitia immediately tried to stop her.

"Cassandra! What do you think you're doing! That thing could be incredibly dangerous!"

"Oh relax, Sophie! I just want to get a quick peek!"

"But who knows what kind of weird stuff from space that thing could have in it!?"

"Don't worry, Sophie! I promise that I'll be careful... Sheesh..."

However, just as she approached it, the meteor cracked open and emitted a foul gas that knocked Cassandra unconscious! Sophitia immediately freaked out.

"Oh my god! Cassandra! Are you okay?! Cassandra!!!"

Just then, Cassandra's unconscious body began expanding rapidly. She was growing at an alarming pace, and Sophitia had to step away to avoid being crushed under her sister's expanding form! Much to Sophitia's dismay, Cassandra's body kept on growing for quite some time. By the time her growth had finished, she was at least 100 feet tall! Sophitia was terrified at the sight of her now-giant little sister. Suddenly, Cassandra stirred.

"Ugh... That was the worst thing I have EVER smelled! I guess that I should have listened to you, huh Sophie? Um... Sophie? Sophitia, Where are you?"

Cassandra looked around for her big sister, but was unable to locate her. Suddenly, a small movement drew her attention. As she looked at the source of the motion, she was shocked by what she saw; Her big sister was jumping up and down to try and get her attention, and she was small enough to fit into the palm of Cassandra's hand! She immediately scooped up her 'little' sister, and try to ask her what happened.

"OMG! Sophitia, what happened to you! How the heck did you get so small?!"

"I didn't get small, Cassie! You got big! This is exactly why I didn't want you messing with an unknown rock from outer space in the first place!"

Cassandra quickly looked around and saw that Sopitia was right; The tree that she was sitting under earlier was now nothing more than a stick of broccoli to her, and the meteorite that was once bigger than her was now the size of a mere pebble!

"Wow! I really AM huge! Hehehe... This could be a lot of fun!"

"What are you talking about, Cassandra?! This is dangerous! We have to find a way to fix you!"


How will Cassandra respond to this?
142331.title: Cassandra the colossus!

Personally I just don't care. It used to be that I kept things limited to non-gay sexual stories, but after realizing that in life I didn't care, why should I care here?

I love Soul Calibur, and I don't see many stories about it. Whatever I write myself will be in the category of feet and shrinking; my fetishes. I do believe that everyone is born the way they are; you don't choose your fetish or sexual orientation.

Pretty much everything is allowed.
